channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0579; 10:54AM; 7260 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O1slF3; #Tujunga; First arriving 14 LAFD Firefighters took just 16 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within the one upstairs motel room of fire origin at the Galaxy Motel, preventing flames from extending into the attic. One adult male civilian who sustained smoke inhalation has been transported by LAFD Paramedics to an area hospital in undetermined condition. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC11 BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E24 E260 E274 E289 E77 E89 E98 EM14 RA74 RA77 RA874 T60 T74 T89; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0579; 10:38AM; 7260 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O1slF3; #Tujunga; PRELIM: Fire in one upstairs unit at a two-story motel.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC11 BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E24 E260 E274 E289 E77 E89 E98 EM14 RA74 RA77 RA874 T60 T74 T89; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#1534; 08:30PM; 1545 N Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RWsVoE; #EastHollywood; The two missing pet canines have been found by Firefighters, and appear unharmed. They are being medically assessed and comfortably cared for by LAFD crews at the scene. The man taken to the area hospital appears to have unspecified non-life threatening injuries. The fire cause remains under investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E220 E227 E235 E27 E41 E52 E82 EM11 EM14 RA52 RA56 RA82 RA835 SO1 T20 T27 T35; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1534; 07:56PM; 1545 N Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RWsVoE; #EastHollywood; First arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within one unit on the third floor of a four-story modern center-hallway style apartment building (three occupied floors over parking). One adult male civilian with unspecified injury is now being transported to an area hospital by LAFD Paramedics in undetermined condition. LAFD Firefighters are continuing their systematic search of the fire unit and smoke charged hallways for two missing pet canines, as they guide several building occupants down stairways to fresh air, and assist other residents in sheltering in place within their unthreatened apartment units. The fire cause is under investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E220 E227 E235 E27 E41 E52 E82 EM11 EM14 RA52 RA56 RA82 RA835 SO1 T20 T27 T35; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1534; 07:35PM; 1545 N Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RWsVoE; #EastHollywood; PRELIM: An offensive firefight in one unit on the third floor of a four-story modern center-hallway style apartment building (three occupied floors over parking). One civilian is now being examined by LAFD Paramedics for unspecified injury.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E220 E227 E235 E27 E41 E52 E82 EM11 EM14 RA52 RA56 RA82 RA835 SO1 T20 T27 T35 ; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#1500; 07:19PM; 2321 S La Brea Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aXiPg4; #MidCity; PRELIM: Two vehicle traffic collision with one patient who has minor-to-moderate injury. No entrapment. Two toppled power poles, a toppled street light and sheared fire hydrant, causing a large volume of water to fall upon the roof of an adjacent one story home. No apparent collapse hazard. #LATraffic: Closure of all northbound and southbound lanes of LaBrea Avenue between 21st Street and the Santa Monica (I-10) Freeway until LAPD and LADWP operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Transit Users: Follow @MetroLAAlerts on Twitter/X ( https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts) for any service impact. Media Inquiries: LAPD West Traffic Division (Incident #3615) and LADWP.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E294 E68 E94 EM11 RA29 RA43 RA58 T94; CH4; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1473; 07:12PM; 1559 N Marine Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tJaSdH; #Wilmington; 37 LAFD Firefighters took just 16 minutes to access, confine and extinguish heavy fire throughout the converted attic of a 1,046 square foot one-story home (built 1927). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E238 E285 E36 E38 E49 E85 RA38 RA848 SO1 T38 T85; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1473; 06:56PM; 1559 N Marine Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tJaSdH; #Wilmington; Offensive firefight at a one-story home with fire through the roof.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E238 E285 E36 E38 E49 E85 RA38 RA848 T38 T85; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1084; 03:31PM; 10615 S Avalon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S13SRk; #GreenMeadows; *Address Corrected from 107th Street*. The already well established fire was first noticed as a smoke plume and reported as a fire prior to any 9-1-1 call, by LAFD firefighters who arrived quickly after clearing another emergency in the neighborhood. It took the first 30 arriving LAFD personnel just 13 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames in the downstairs portion of a two-story residential fourplex. During their well-coordinated attack on the flames, firefighters discovered and rescued six pet dogs from the smoke charged unit of fire origin. While five of the animals were successfully resuscitated and/or medically stabilized with basic medical care and the use of oxygen, one of the pets was sadly beyond help and perished at the scene. No human injuries were reported. Five persons (4 adults & 1 child / undetermined affiliation) have been displaced by the fire, and will be assisted by the American Red Cross. The cause of the fire is under investigation. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 FR64 RA65 RA865 SO1 SQ21 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1084; 03:18PM; 450 E 107th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/47PyvPP; #GreenMeadows; *Address Tentative* PRELIM: Heavy smoke showing from a two-story garden style apartment building.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 RA65 RA865 SQ21 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey
